name: restaurant-ai-backend
description: Backend API for Restaurant AI System

scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for Node.js'
scripts.migrate: echo 'üîç Starting migration with verbose logging...' && node-pg-migrate
scripts.migrate:up: echo '‚¨ÜÔ∏è Running UP migrations...' && echo "Database URL: ${DATABASE_URL:0:30}..." && node-pg-migrate up
scripts.migrate:down: echo '‚¨áÔ∏è Running DOWN migrations...' && node-pg-migrate down
scripts.migrate:reset-dev: echo 'üîÑ RESETTING DEV DATABASE MIGRATION STATE...' && echo "Target DB: ${DATABASE_URL:0:50}..." && psql $DATABASE_URL -c 'DELETE FROM pgmigrations; SELECT COUNT(*) as remaining_migrations FROM pgmigrations;' 2>/dev/null || echo 'üìù No pgmigrations table found (OK for fresh DB)' && echo '‚¨ÜÔ∏è Running fresh migrations...' && npm run migrate:up
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.setup: npm run db:setup && npm run test:setup
